page.title: 17Residents Working in Whitley
page.content: In the{1981}Census there were {249} people of Whitley in employment of all kinds and in different places. In{1985 we have found that at least forty residents are still employed inWhitley in all kinds of jobs ranging from farming to the Church; 23 of which are self-employed in such work as business consultant or casual farm worker. We have residents who work for themselves in garages, farms and small holdings, builders, carpenters, play-school, various small businesses and crafts, agricultural contractors, hairdressing and public houses. Those who work for others in the village include care- takers, teachers, farm workers, paper and other deliveries, gardeners and glaziers.There are no longer any shops in the village, but as most people have cars this is less of a handicap than it would have been years ago.
